name: Make your own trinket tray & Keepsake Bowl | 1st March, Sat | 3-5pm
description:
Get ready to mix, pour, and create at our **Jesmonite Workshop!** In just
**two hours** , you’ll design your own **trinket tray and keepsake bowl**
—perfect for storing jewelry, keys, or little treasures. No prior experience
needed—just bring your creativity, and we’ll guide you through the process!

The best part? You get to take your beautiful, handcrafted pieces home with
you. 🎨✨

Join us for a fun, hands-on session and discover the magic of Jesmonite!  
> Step by step guidance by an artist  
> Make a trinket tray & Keepsake Bowl  
> Beginner friendly  
> Children are welcome for all workshops  
> Includes a non alcoholic beverage & Brik Oven Pizza's to share 🍕
Location : Paint Bar, Sadashivnagar, Bangalore  
Find directions to our studio here ->

**Please Note : We have only 10 seats available for this workshop**

name: Happy Women's Day | 8th March, Sat | 3-5pm
description:
Celebrate **Women's Day** with a fun and creative**** Sip & Paint session at
Paint Bar! Grab a beverage, pick up a brush, and let your creativity flow as
you paint in a relaxed and joyful atmosphere. No experience needed—just good
vibes, great company, and a masterpiece to take home!  
  
We are an all Women's team - sooo, we've all voted to give all Women a buy 1
get 1 free ticket this Women's day to spread the love! 💕  

**If you're a women, then just buy 1 ticket, and bring along a plus 1 :)  
** For all you men out there - this is your sign to buy a woman in your life
this ticket!  
  
**P.S - This is a Women only event! :)**

Join us on **8th March** for an unforgettable evening of art and celebration!
✨  
  
> Step by step guidance by an artist  
> 12 by 16 inch canvas each  
> Beginner friendly  
> Children are welcome for all workshops  
> Includes a non alcoholic beverage & Brik Oven Pizza's to share 🍕
Location : Paint Bar, Sadashivnagar, Bangalore  
Find directions to our studio here ->

name: Gold Foil workshop | 15th March, Sat | 3-5pm
description:
Join us for a shimmering art experience at our **Gold Foil Painting
Workshop!** Create a stunning masterpiece using gold foil, guided by our
expert team. No experience needed—just bring your creativity, and we’ll
provide everything else!  
  
> Step by step guidance by an artist  
> 12 by 16 inch canvas each  
> Beginner friendly  
> Children are welcome for all workshops  
> Includes a non alcoholic beverage & Brik Oven Pizza's to share 🍕
Location : Paint Bar, Sadashivnagar, Bangalore  
Find directions to our studio here ->

name: Acrylic on Canvas | 22nd March, Sat | 3-5pm
description:
Unleash your inner artist at our **Acrylic on Canvas Painting Workshop**!
Whether you're a beginner or a seasoned painter, you'll create your own
vibrant masterpiece using acrylic paints on canvas. Our team will guide you
every step of the way—no experience needed! Just come ready to have fun and
explore your creativity.

Let’s make some art together! 🌈✨

> Step by step guidance by an artist  
> 12 by 16 inch canvas each  
> Beginner friendly  
> Children are welcome for all workshops  
> Includes a non alcoholic beverage & Brik Oven Pizza's to share 🍕
Location : Paint Bar, Sadashivnagar, Bangalore  
Find directions to our studio here ->
